DESC.PARA: The chips_contrib package provides a number of useful routines for ChIPS users, and is provided as part of the CIAO contributed scripts package.
The module can be loaded into ChIPS, Sherpa or Python scripts by saying one of the following:
This will load in all the modules that are part of this package; this currently includes:

ROW.DATA: Python decorators for writing routines that use ChIPS
Create scatter plots for a set of variables (new in CIAO 4.7)
Utility routines for ChIPS such as xlog()
